attributes.title: It glitches your phone
attributes.review: This app slows my phone down so much and honestly a waist of space. It doesn’t do much and it just isn’t good to your phone

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: It kept glitching me out the app every time I opened it. Also once it downloaded (it took 13 minutes) it was just a blue screen saying trump.

attributes.title: I can’t believe this is legal 😡
attributes.review: This app stole all of my information and posted it all over the internet. But the worst thing about it is the pop ups, P0Rn! DO NOT download this app 😠😡🤬

attributes.title: An actual cult
attributes.review: Thought I’d be getting great political updates but all i see is ads for trump merch 😐 this just further proves that the maga cult is nothing but a bunch of idiotic republicans with a case of celebrity worship syndrome. Get help❤️

attributes.title: This is the worst app
attributes.review: This app is trash I would never support trump he’s a he’s a orange and he acts stupid like I don’t know why I freaking got on this app but it is so dumb OK first of all you’re making life miserable!!!!!!🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: THIS WAS THE WORST APP EVER!!
attributes.review: It took 24 hours to download 😒 and when it downloaded it MADE MY FINGERS SMELL LIKE CHEETOS!?? I don’t know but it took me 20 hand washes to get the stank smell away 😭 and then IT MADE ME LOOK LIKE AN ORANGE NEVER DOWNLOAD THIS !! I tried so hard to get the orange off my face! And TRUMP HIMSELF SUCKSSSS HE SAYS HE SUPPORTS BLM BUT HE IS DOING IT TO GET SUPPORTERS AND HE IS A CHILD MOLESTER KICK TRUMP 2020!!!!

attributes.title: Serious Problem
attributes.review: This app is lagged my phone screen cracked and now I have to pay hundreds of dollars to get it fixed 🤦  thanks.

attributes.title: App
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever because I can’t see what changes he is going to make so honestly I feel like that should not even have this app.

attributes.title: Uninspiring, just like trump
attributes.review: I had zero expectations from the beginning. I was right. 💩 This app fully embodies trump’s personality. It’s boring, stupid, and quite frankly irrelevant. 👎 If I could give it zero stars, I would. 🥱

attributes.title: WOW
attributes.review: I’m very disappointed in this app!!! Not only does trump do horrible things but now he’s deleting other apps that people enjoy! I’m Ashamed!! I am most definitely not recommending this app!
